title: Math Equation

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Pick a player. They draw 1 x 1 + 1 card(s).

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:cyan:1106716163184009277> ):
fields.value: Set up a math equation with 4 ( +Minus -Plus to keep it this way) numbers that range from -2 to 2 and 3 ( +Minus -Plus ) basic mathematical operations of your choice ( +, -, x, /)

desc:
Post 1976
- When affected by **Plus** or **Minus**, the below numbers may go into the negatives or be 0.
